headline: How Recent Moves in AI and Earnings Are Rewriting the Story for Walmart
summary: Walmart’s updated stock narrative now embeds a slightly higher fair value estimate of about $119, up from roughly $118, as analysts lean into a more constructive long term outlook. Small tweaks to the model, including a marginally lower discount rate near 6.99% and a modestly higher revenue growth assumption around 4.92%, reflect growing conviction in resilient comps, expanding alternative profit streams, and early upside from agentic commerce initiatives. Stay tuned to learn how you can...
